Action.author: chawlanikhil24
Action.body: I am developing a automated script that will deploy fabric-1.0 over K8s in a click. Meanwhile, if possible then the manifests can be reviewed at my repository, here is the link|https://github.com/chawlanikhil24/hyperledger-fabric-k8s .

Action.author: baohua
Action.body: The patchset should be located at gerrit.hyperledger.org.
